name: Fantasy Jailbreak!
description:
All good fantasy adventures start in a tavern. This one starts in a prison, so set your expectations accordingly.

Queen  Keldra of Santiva has you locked in her dungeons! You've gotta make a break for it! 

  • Choose-Your-Own-Adventure!
  • 8 Endings!
  • Butt crystals, but not the type you might expect!

Discover the secret of telefartation! Master the Way of the Blade! Become Queen of Santiva! Break out of jail any way you can!

Downloadable on Android!

Made for Finally Finish Something 2022
